title: A two storied house for sale or Rent
details:
1. 16 perches
2. Ground floor has one bedroom with attached bathroom with hot,cold water and a/c
3. First floor has one master bedroom with attached bathroom with hot,cold water and a/c
4. Two bed rooms with a common bathroom
5. Balcony
6. Dining room and kitchen
7. Servants room and toilet
8. The modern polished roof and floor was tile and cut and polished
9. Three kilometer to Galle.
10. 1.5 km to Karapitiya hospital
11. Car parking for two vehicles
